mapper.insert: insert into client values( (select max(client_no)+1 from client), #{client_name}, #{client_company}, #{client_job}, #{client_email}, #{client_phone}, #{client_addr}, #{client_com_tel}, #{client_loc_x}, #{client_loc_y}, default, #{client_comment}, #{emp_no}, sysdate, default )
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, cl.* from (select * from client order by client_no desc) cl where rownum >= 1) where rnum >= #{startRow} and rnum <= #{endRow} and client_delete <> 'Y'
select * from client where client_contract = 'N' and client_delete <> 'Y'

select * from (select rownum rnum, cl.* from (select * from client where client_contract <> 'Y' order by client_no desc) cl where rownum >= 1) where rnum >= #{startRow} and rnum <= #{endRow} and client_delete <> 'Y'

if.if: select count(*) from client where client_contract = 'Y'
select count(*) from client where emp_no = #{emp_no} and client_contract = 'Y'
select count(*) from client where client_contract = 'Y' and emp_no=#{emp_no} and client_company=#{client_company}
select count(*) from client where client_contract = 'Y' and client_company=#{client_company}

mapper.select: select * from client c, contract ct where c.client_company like '%'||#{client_company}||'%' and c.emp_no = #{emp_no} and c.client_contract = 'Y' and c.client_no = ct.client_no

select c.client_no, c.client_name, c.client_company, c.emp_no, e.emp_name, c.client_job, c.client_email, e.emp_phone, c.client_addr, c.client_phone, c.client_contract, c.client_comment from emp e, client c where e.emp_no = c.emp_no and c.client_no = #{client_no}
mapper.update: update (select * from client c, emp e where c.emp_no=e.emp_no and client_no = #{client_no} ) set client_no = #{client_no}, client_name = #{client_name}, client_job = #{client_job}, client_email = #{client_email}, client_addr = #{client_addr}, client_phone = #{client_phone}, client_contract = #{client_contract}, client_comment = #{client_comment}
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, cl.* from (select * from client where (client_delete <> 'Y' and client_name like '%'||#{client_name}||'%') or (client_delete <> 'Y' and client_company like '%'||#{client_name}||'%')) cl) where rnum >= 1 and rnum <= 10

select * from (select rownum rnum, cl.* from (select * from client where (client_contract = 'N' and client_delete <> 'Y' and client_name like '%'||#{client_name}||'%') or (client_contract = 'N' and client_delete <> 'Y' and client_company like '%'||#{client_name}||'%')) cl) where rnum >= 1 and rnum <= 10
select * from client, emp where client_no = #{client_no} and client.emp_no = emp.emp_no
